products.short_zh: 圆形福字，百搭耐看，适合门窗与客厅。
products.short_en: A timeless round Fu for windows and living rooms.
products.desc_zh: 经典圆福构图，线条干净，适合新年与乔迁装饰。可定制尺寸与配色。
products.desc_en: Clean classic round Fu composition for Lunar New Year or housewarming. Custom sizes/colors available.

products.short_zh: 方形更稳重，适合大门与玄关。
products.short_en: A stable square Fu for doorways and entry halls.
products.desc_zh: 方福寓意“稳稳的福气”。适合贴门、玄关玻璃或礼盒封面。
products.desc_en: Square Fu symbolizes steady blessings. Great for doors, glass entryways, and gift packaging.

products.short_zh: “福倒了=福到了”，节日氛围拉满。
products.short_en: Inverted Fu: a festive “blessings arrive” tradition.
products.desc_zh: 适合春节大门、窗户或店铺玻璃。可做大号醒目款。
products.desc_en: Perfect for Lunar New Year doors/windows or shopfront glass. Available in bold larger sizes.

products.short_zh: 生肖系列，适合送礼与收藏。
products.short_en: Zodiac series—great for gifts and collection.
products.desc_zh: 生肖鼠搭配祥云与花纹边框，适合新年、生日、开业祝福。
products.desc_en: Zodiac rat with cloud motifs and floral border—ideal for New Year, birthdays, and grand openings.

products.short_zh: 牛气满满，寓意踏实丰收。
products.short_en: Ox motif for diligence and abundance.
products.desc_zh: 牛与稻穗/祥云组合，适合餐厅、客厅与店铺门面。
products.desc_en: Ox paired with grain/cloud motifs—fits dining areas, living rooms, and storefronts.

products.short_zh: 虎虎生威，气场强。
products.short_en: Bold tiger motif with strong presence.
products.desc_zh: 适合挂在玄关或办公室，寓意勇猛与突破。
products.desc_en: Great for entryways or offices—symbolizes courage and breakthroughs.

products.short_zh: 温柔灵动，适合亲子与卧室。
products.short_en: Gentle rabbit motif—nice for bedrooms and families.
products.desc_zh: 兔与花枝搭配，整体更柔和。适合婚房/宝宝房装饰。
products.desc_en: Rabbit with floral branches for a softer look—ideal for wedding rooms or nurseries.

products.short_zh: 龙腾盛世，适合大场景装饰。
products.short_en: Majestic dragon—best for statement decor.
products.desc_zh: 细节丰富，适合大门/落地窗。可做金红搭配增强质感。
products.desc_en: Highly detailed—great for large doors/windows. Optional red+gold style for premium feel.

products.short_zh: 灵动曲线，设计感强。
products.short_en: Elegant curves with modern design flair.
products.desc_zh: 蛇形线条与纹样边框结合，适合现代家居风格。
products.desc_en: Snake curves plus patterned border—fits modern interiors.

products.short_zh: 马到成功，适合开业与升职祝福。
products.short_en: “Success arrives” horse—great for business wishes.
products.desc_zh: 马与祥云/铜钱纹结合，适合办公室与店铺。
products.desc_en: Horse with cloud/coin motifs—ideal for offices and shops.

products.short_zh: 三阳开泰，寓意好运开启。
products.short_en: Goat motif for “good fortune begins.”
products.desc_zh: 适合新年、乔迁、婚礼等喜庆场合。
products.desc_en: Perfect for New Year, housewarming, weddings, and celebrations.

products.short_zh: 灵巧活泼，适合儿童房。
products.short_en: Playful monkey—great for kids’ rooms.
products.desc_zh: 猴与桃/花纹组合，寓意聪明与长寿。
products.desc_en: Monkey with peach/floral motifs—symbolizes cleverness and longevity.

products.short_zh: 守护与忠诚，适合家庭。
products.short_en: Symbol of loyalty and protection.
products.desc_zh: 狗与平安纹样搭配，适合客厅/玄关。
products.desc_en: Dog with peace motifs—ideal for living rooms and entryways.

products.short_zh: 福气与丰盛，寓意安稳生活。
products.short_en: A symbol of comfort and abundance.
products.desc_zh: 猪与花纹边框组合，适合新年与乔迁。
products.desc_en: Pig with floral border—great for New Year and housewarming.

products.short_zh: 牡丹象征富贵，适合客厅主位。
products.short_en: Peony symbolizes prosperity—perfect for living rooms.
products.desc_zh: 花瓣层次感强，适合配灯光与玻璃窗展示。
products.desc_en: Layered petals look stunning against light and glass windows.

products.short_zh: 清雅莲花，适合书房与茶室。
products.short_en: Elegant lotus—ideal for study rooms and tea spaces.
products.desc_zh: 莲花寓意清净与平安，线条简洁耐看。
products.desc_en: Lotus represents serenity and peace with clean, timeless lines.

products.short_zh: 梅花坚韧，适合冬季与新年。
products.short_en: Plum blossom for resilience—perfect in winter/New Year.
products.desc_zh: 梅枝与花朵结合，适合窗边与玄关小景。
products.desc_en: Branch-and-blossom composition fits windows and small entry displays.

products.short_zh: 竹寓意节节高升，适合办公室。
products.short_en: Bamboo for steady growth—great for offices.
products.desc_zh: 竹叶层次分明，适合现代极简风。
products.desc_en: Crisp bamboo layers suit modern minimalist interiors.

products.short_zh: 兰花清雅，适合卧室与书房。
products.short_en: Orchid motif for refined elegance.
products.desc_zh: 线条柔和、留白充足，适合浅色墙面。
products.desc_en: Soft lines with generous negative space—beautiful on light walls.

products.short_zh: 菊花寓意长寿，适合长辈礼物。
products.short_en: Chrysanthemum symbolizes longevity—great as a gift.
products.desc_zh: 适合重阳节、生日祝福与家庭装饰。
products.desc_en: Ideal for birthdays, family decor, and seasonal celebrations.

products.short_zh: 婚礼必备，喜气十足。
products.short_en: Wedding essential—joyful and festive.
products.desc_zh: 囍字搭配花纹边框，适合婚房、喜宴与伴手礼包装。
products.desc_en: Double Happiness with floral border—perfect for wedding rooms, banquets, and gift packaging.

products.short_zh: 成双成对，寓意良缘。
products.short_en: Paired birds for a blessed union.
products.desc_zh: 喜鹊与花枝组合，适合婚礼布置与背景墙点缀。
products.desc_en: Magpies with floral branches—ideal for wedding styling and backdrop accents.

products.short_zh: 锦鲤寓意富足，适合餐厅与店铺。
products.short_en: Koi for abundance—great for dining areas and shops.
products.desc_zh: 双鱼/锦鲤构图，适合年节与开业庆祝。
products.desc_en: Twin fish/koi composition for New Year and grand opening celebrations.

products.short_zh: 仙鹤寓意吉祥与长寿。
products.short_en: Crane symbolizes auspiciousness and longevity.
products.desc_zh: 适合送长辈或摆在书房、客厅的安静角落。
products.desc_en: A thoughtful gift for elders, perfect for calm corners in studies/living rooms.

products.short_zh: 石榴寓意多子多福，适合婚房与新家。
products.short_en: Pomegranate for many blessings—great for new homes.
products.desc_zh: 果实裂开露籽的细节更显喜庆与生命力。
products.desc_en: Seeds and split-fruit detail add lively, celebratory symbolism.

products.short_zh: 灯笼元素，节日氛围浓。
products.short_en: Lantern motif for strong festive vibes.
products.desc_zh: 适合元宵/春节布置，也适合店铺促销背景。
products.desc_en: Ideal for Lantern Festival/New Year decor and shop promotion backdrops.

products.short_zh: “春”字搭配边框，适合窗格。
products.short_en: Spring character with border—great for window panes.
products.desc_zh: 边框可做成窗格比例，贴在玻璃上更有“老街年味”。
products.desc_en: Border matches window-pane proportions for an authentic festive street vibe on glass.

products.short_zh: 山水意境，适合中式与新中式空间。
products.short_en: Landscape mood—perfect for Chinese-style interiors.
products.desc_zh: 线条更细致，适合大窗展示或装框悬挂。
products.desc_en: Fine details—great for large windows or framed wall display.

products.short_zh: 城市天际线剪影，现代礼物。
products.short_en: Modern skyline silhouette—gift-ready.
products.desc_zh: 外滩/东方明珠元素，适合送朋友或做纪念品。
products.desc_en: Bund/Oriental Pearl elements—great as souvenirs and modern gifts.

products.short_zh: 北京元素：城楼/胡同/古建风。
products.short_en: Beijing vibe: traditional architecture silhouettes.
products.desc_zh: 适合外宾礼物与城市纪念系列。
products.desc_en: Excellent for gifts to international visitors and city memorabilia collections.

products.short_zh: 上传照片即可定制，独一无二。
products.short_en: Unique custom from your photo.
products.desc_zh: 根据宠物照片提取轮廓并加入花纹边框，适合纪念与礼物。
products.desc_en: We extract your pet’s outline from a photo and add a decorative border—perfect as a keepsake or gift.
